TPCookiePolicyBar.title: Activate Data Protocol
TPCookiePolicyBar.description: We use a limited set of protocols to operate and enhance the system. You have precise command.

core.title: Core Protocol (Required)
core.description: For system security, authentication, and core functionality. Cannot be disabled.

performance.title: Performance Protocol
performance.description: Anonymous analytics to help us identify bottlenecks and improve platform speed.

growth.title: Growth Protocol
growth.description: Data to help us improve our outreach to future architects and creators.
